resume_text:
NAME: Harry Rodriguez
EMAIL: harry.rodriguez@email.com
PHONE: 555-654-3210

SUMMARY:
Security Engineer with 4 years of experience in protecting systems and data from cyber threats. Proficient in security tools and techniques.

SKILLS:
Python, Linux, AWS, Azure, CompTIA Security+, Ethical Hacking, Network Security

EXPERIENCE:
Cyber Security Solutions - Security Engineer (2021 - Present)
- Conducted vulnerability assessments and penetration testing.
- Implemented security controls.

IT Services - Systems Administrator (2020 - 2021)
- Managed and maintained Linux servers.
- Troubleshooted system issues.

EDUCATION:
University of California, Los Angeles - Bachelor's in Cybersecurity (2020)

CERTIFICATIONS:
CompTIA Security+, Certified Ethical Hacker
